title: Fiddlesticks Splash art
body: The fiddlesticks splash art on the PBE doesn't properly show his face. I'm specifying the splash art shown on the 'Launch' screen right before you click the 'Launch' button.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Are you referring to the Free Champion Rotation slides? I'm not currently seeing him on the launch page, as the F2P champions have changed.

In the future, please use the [PBE Report A Bug](http://pbr.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en_BE/login) to log issues occurring on the PBE, as opposed to live. Thanks! :D
